content: यवनः [यु-युच्] {@--1@} A Greek, an Ionian. {@--2@} Any foreigner, or barbarian; <ls>Ms. 10. 44</ls>; (the word is applied at present to a Mahomedan or a European also). {@--3@} A carrot. {@--4@} Olibanum. {@--5@} A courser or swift horse. {@--6@} Speed. {@--7@} Wheat. {@--8@} A kind of grass. --नाः ({%<ab>m.</ab>%} <ab>pl.</ab>) {@--1@} The Ionians or Greeks. {@--2@} The Greek astrologers.
